ticket.title: Display RAILS_ENV in script/console
ticket.original-body:
to avoid stupid errors (yes, we all need some sleep sometimes), I think we should display the current env in the rails console.
I've set this in my .irbrc file :
# Prompts IRB.conf[:PROMPT][:CUSTOM] = { :PROMPT_N => "[#{ENV["RAILS_ENV"].capitalize}]>> ", :PROMPT_I => "[#{ENV["RAILS_ENV"].capitalize}]>> ", :PROMPT_S => nil, :PROMPT_C => "?> ", :RETURN => "=> %s\n" }
# Set default prompt IRB.conf[:PROMPT_MODE] = :CUSTOM
So it displays :
[Development]>> 1+1 => 2
Maybe this could be included in @./railties/lib/commands/console.rb@ ?
Thanks
